author: gstein
msg: Add a callback to the RA callbacks for fetching WC properties. This
allows the RA functions to get version URLs of existing files when
necessary. Given a version URL, we can fetch a diff from the server.
(svn_ra_plugin_t {}): constify the callbacks to the open() method
* libsvn_ra_dav/ra_dav.h (svn_ra_dav__open): add const to callbacks param
* libsvn_client/ra.c (get_wc_prop): new function to fetch WC props

author: gstein
msg: Use the new svn_client__callback_baton_t type for the callback baton
(rather than the auth baton). This allows us to keep some fields private
from the calling app, and gives us room to expand for additional
path, and do_store fields. they are not needed by applications.
svn_client__get_authenticator): the baton is the callback baton,
the callback baton, not the auth baton. copmensate.
(get_ra_callbacks): removed; the contents were folded directly into
(svn_client__open_ra_session): build the callback table and baton
the base_dir since the trickle-down usage really wants a stringbuf
for right now. use the explict type for the auth_baton since we
know/require what it must be (rather than an opaque ptr). add the
the pool field; it has been removed.

author: gstein
msg: made private to the file. put newly-named svn_client__get_authenticator
into the callback vtable. doc string moved here from client.h

author: gstein
msg: Moved some functions from auth.c to ra.c. NO CHANGES were made to the
Note: this breaks the compilation since get_authenticator is not defined
in ra.c.  Will fix in the next commit.

author: gstein
msg: (log_do_committed): make sure to assign to 'err' before testing it.
